attributes.action: Deport Muslim hardliners out of Britain to their original countries and introduce severe punishment to the proven terrorists
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We believe that those are great danger to society cohesion in Britain. They risk creating a dangerous, unfair profile about, even the law-abiding, peaceful, proud to be British Muslim society. The ones who are caught attempting mass murder should be severely punished, even if that means introducing the capital punishment.
